info.title: Auto-generated OAS of Proxy-Print using OOPS

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Consumer username used to authenticate and subscribe to SSE

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Consumer password used to authenticate and subscribe to SSE

200.description: OK. Subscription established; returns an SSE stream (text/event-stream).

401.description: Unauthorized. Password does not match.

404.description: Not Found. Consumer with given username not found.

200.description: OK

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication is required to access this resource

403.description: Forbidden - authenticated user does not have the required role (ROLE_USER)

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username provided for authentication; retrieved from WebRequest#getParameter("username"). If omitted, authentication will fail and the response success will be false.

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password provided for authentication; retrieved from WebRequest#getParameter("password"). If omitted, authentication will fail and the response success will be false.

200.description: Login response. Returns 'success' boolean. If authentication succeeds, includes a 'user' object and optionally an 'externalURL' string for consumer users.

parameters.name: printShopID
parameters.description: ID of the printshop

200.description: Successful response with list of employees when printshop exists, otherwise a success:false payload.

parameters.name: printShopID
parameters.description: ID of the printshop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Employee object to add; expected JSON with username, password and name.

200.description: OK. JSON object with operation result.

id.description: ID of the created employee (present when success is true).

message.description: Error or informational message (present when success is false).

parameters.name: printShopID
parameters.description: ID of the printshop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Employee object to update. Must include name, username and password.

200.description: Successful operation (the controller always returns a JSON object with success flag)

message.description: Optional error message when success is false (e.g. 'Empregado n√£o existe')

200.description: JSON object indicating whether the deletion was successful.

success.description: True if the employee was found and deleted; false otherwise.

200.description: 200 response. On success (success=true) returns printshop statistics: nPendingRequests, nInProgressRequests, nFinished, nEmployees, pshopProfit. On failure returns an object with success=false.

parameters.name: Authorization
parameters.description: Bearer token used for authentication (user must have ROLE_MANAGER).

200.description: Successful response. On success returns a 'printshop' object and 'success': true. On failure returns only 'success': false.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: RegisterRequest object. This method allows to add a register request to a new printshop.

200.description: OK

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the register request to accept (printshop register request id).

200.description: OK

parameters.name: printRequestID
parameters.description: Identifier of the register request to reject

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Rejection motive (request body)

200.description: OK. Returns a JSON object with a single property 'success' indicating outcome.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication is required to access this endpoint.

403.description: Forbidden. The authenticated user does not have the required ROLE_ADMIN authority.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred (for example an IOException while sending the rejection email).

200.description: OK

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude in decimal degrees (parsed as Double). If not provided the endpoint returns success=false.

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude in decimal degrees (parsed as Double). If not provided the endpoint returns success=false.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a JSON object with a boolean 'success' field and, when success is true, a map of distances to PrintShop objects.

printshops.description: Map with distance (as string keys) to PrintShop objects

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: PrintShop identifier

200.description: Successful response containing the printshop price table or a failure indicator when the printshop is not found.

printcopy.description: Map from color string to an array of paper range entries.

rings.description: Map from ring type string to an array of ring items.

covers.description: Map from cover type string to cover price info.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the print request

200.description: OK

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the print request to change status

200.description: Successful operation

newStatus.description: The new status of the print request when a status transition occurs (e.g. IN_PROGRESS, FINISHED, LIFTED).

200.description: Successful response. JSON object containing a list of print requests (possibly empty) under 'printrequest' and a 'success' boolean.

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication is required to access this resource.

403.description: Forbidden - the authenticated user does not have the required role (ROLE_MANAGER or ROLE_EMPLOYEE).

200.description: OK. Returns a JSON object with a boolean 'success'. When success is true, 'historyrequests' is an array of PrintRequest objects.

paymentType.description: payment type string; e.g. PROXYPRINT_PAYMENT or PAYPAL_PAYMENT

403.description: Forbidden. The authenticated user does not have the required role to access this endpoint.

500.description: Internal Server Error. Unexpected error while processing the request.

200.description: A JSON object containing the satisfied requests for the authenticated printshop and a success flag.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the print request to cancel

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Cancellation motive

200.description: OK. Returns a JSON object with a boolean 'success' property indicating whether the cancel operation succeeded.

500.description: Internal Server Error ‚Äî unexpected error while processing the request.

200.description: OK
A JSON array of PrintShop objects

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the document to retrieve

200.description: OK - PDF document returned.

Content-Disposition.description: Indicates inline display and the filename, e.g. "inline;filename={name}.pdf".

Cache-Control.description: Cache control header set to "must-revalidate, post-check=0, pre-check=0".

401.description: Unauthorized - the authenticated employee does not belong to the printshop that owns the document. Content-Type: application/json.

404.description: Not Found - document with the given id does not exist. Content-Type: application/json.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the printshop

200.description: A JSON array of reviews

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the printshop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Review object containing the review text and rating

200.description: OK

parameters.name: printShopId
parameters.description: ID of the print shop

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: ID of the review

200.description: Successful deletion. Returns the deleted review.

401.description: Unauthorized. The authenticated user is not the owner of the review.

404.description: Not Found. The printshop or the review does not exist.

parameters.name: printShopId
parameters.description: ID of the printshop

parameters.name: reviewId
parameters.description: ID of the review

parameters.name: review
parameters.description: Text content of the review

parameters.name: rating
parameters.description: Numerical rating for the review

200.description: Successful edit. Returns the updated review.

401.description: Unauthorized. The authenticated user is not the review owner.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Print shop id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: PaperTableItem to add to the price table

200.description: Successful operation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Print shop id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: PaperTableItem object

200.description: Successful operation ‚Äî JSON object with a success flag

success.description: true when the operation succeeded, false otherwise

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the print shop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: PaperTableItem to delete (range and price fields)

200.description: Returns success/insuccess - Delete a new Paper Item from a price table of a certain print shop.

success.description: true when the deletion succeeded, false otherwise

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Print shop id

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: RingTableItem object

200.description: OK. Returns a JSON object with a single boolean property 'success'. Example: {"success": true} when the item was added, {"success": false} when the print shop was not found.

400.description: Bad Request. The request body is malformed or invalid (e.g. invalid JSON or missing required fields).

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication is required to access this endpoint.

403.description: Forbidden. The authenticated user does not have the required ROLE_MANAGER permission.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred on the server.

200.description: Successful operation. Returns a JSON object with a single boolean property 'success'.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation succeeded (true) or failed (false).

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Print shop identifier

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: RingTableItem to delete

200.description: Successful operation

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the PrintShop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: CoverTableItem object

200.description: Operation result indicating success or failure
JSON object indicating operation success

success.description: true if the operation succeeded, false otherwise

200.description: Operation result. Returns a JSON object with a single boolean property 'success' indicating whether the deletion succeeded.

parameters.name: printShopID
parameters.description: ID of the PrintShop

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: New stapling price as a string (the controller parses it to a float)

200.description: Successful operation

success.description: Indicates if the operation was successful

200.description: OK

prinshops.description: JSON string containing the serialized array of PrintShop objects (the array is serialized to JSON and stored as a string here).

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication is required to access this endpoint.

403.description: Forbidden - the authenticated user does not have the required ROLE_ADMIN authority.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: Admin object to register

200.description: OK - the saved Admin entity is returned
Successful operation
OK - consumers seeding completed

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the consumer to notify (path variable).

parameters.name: message
parameters.description: Notification message (obtained via WebRequest.getParameter("message")).

200.description: Notification sent successfully. Method completes with no response body.

500.description: Internal server error. An unexpected exception occurred while processing the request.

200.description: OK

401.description: Unauthorized

parameters.name: notificationId
parameters.description: ID of the notification to delete. This method allows consumers to delete a notification.

200.description: Returns success.
Notification marked as read. Returns a JSON object with a success flag.

parameters.name: printRequest
parameters.description: JSON string describing the print request. Must include at least a "printshops" array with printshop IDs and a "files" map whose keys are filenames (e.g. "document.pdf") and values are specification lists. This part is required.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: One or more PDF files uploaded as multipart form-data. The server uses each file's original filename (originalFilename) to match the entries in the printRequest.files map (for example, a file with original filename "document.pdf" corresponds to the "document.pdf" key in printRequest.files). Only PDF files are processed.

200.description: Successful operation

budgets.description: Map of printshop IDs to budget strings

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication is required

403.description: Forbidden - authenticated user does not have required role

parameters.name: printRequestID
parameters.description: ID of the print request to finish and submit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON payload with submission details

printshopID.description: ID of the PrintShop to submit the request to

budget.description: Chosen budget/cost for the print request

paymentMethod.description: Payment method (e.g. proxy payment or paypal)

200.description: Successful operation ‚Äî always returns a JSON object with a boolean 'success' property; on failure the object may include a 'message' string.

401.description: Unauthorized ‚Äî authentication is required (enforced by @Secured). The response body is typically a JSON object indicating failure.

403.description: Forbidden ‚Äî authenticated user does not have the required role (ROLE_USER). The response body is typically a JSON object indicating failure.

parameters.name: files
parameters.description: Multipart file(s) to be printed. Endpoint accepts one or more PDF files (other file types are ignored).

200.description: Successful response

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the print request. This method returns the document from a print request.

200.description: Successful response. If the print request is not found returns {"success": false}; otherwise returns {"success": true, "documents": [...] }.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation succeeded (true when the print request was found).

documents.description: Array of documents associated with the print request. Present when success is true.

name.description: File name (without extension) of the document.

totalPages.description: Total number of pages in the document.

specs.description: List of document specifications (printing options) for this document.

firstPage.description: First page for this spec (0 when entire document).

lastPage.description: Last page for this spec (0 when entire document).

printingSchema.description: Printing schema applied to this spec.

name.description: Human readable name of the printing schema.

paperSpecs.description: Paper specification key (format, colors, sides, etc.).

deleted.description: Indicates if the printing schema is marked as deleted.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Print request ID

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON array of printshop IDs for which to calculate budgets

200.description: Successful calculation of budgets

budgets.description: Map of printshop IDs to budget values (serialized as strings)

printRequestID.description: Identifier of the PrintRequest that was used to calculate budgets

200.description: OK. The IPN notification was processed (or ignored) and no content is returned.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred while processing the IPN (for example a ServletException or IOException).

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: ID of the consumer

200.description: OK. IPN notification processed successfully; no response body is returned.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An error occurred while processing the IPN notification.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Unique username for the consumer

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: Password for the consumer account

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: Full name of the consumer

parameters.name: email
parameters.description: Email address of the consumer

parameters.name: latitude
parameters.description: Latitude for the consumer location (stored as string)

parameters.name: longitude
parameters.description: Longitude for the consumer location (stored as string)

200.description: Registration result. On success returns success=true and a consumer object; on failure returns success=false and an error message.

success.description: True if registration succeeded, false otherwise.

consumer.description: The created consumer object (present when success is true).

error.description: Error message (present when success is false).

200.description: OK. Returns the consumer information when authenticated. Response is a JSON object containing a boolean 'success' and, when successful, a 'consumer' object.

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication is required to access this endpoint.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: JSON object with the consumer fields to update. The endpoint reads the request body as a Consumer and uses the fields name, username, password and email to update the current authenticated consumer.

200.description: OK. Returns a JSON object with a single boolean property indicating success of the update.

success.description: true if the consumer information was successfully updated, false otherwise

401.description: Unauthorized. Authentication is required to access this resource.

403.description: Forbidden. The authenticated user does not have the required privileges.

500.description: Internal Server Error. An unexpected error occurred while processing the request.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: The consumer's username (path parameter)

200.description: Successful operation

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Consumer username

200.description: OK
Successful response containing the consumer's pending print requests

401.description: Unauthorized - authentication is required to access this resource

403.description: Forbidden - the authenticated user does not have the required role/permissions

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the print request to cancel

200.description: OK
Successful response: returns the consumer's satisfied print requests history or success=false if consumer not found.

printrequest.description: The PrintRequest object serialized by Gson (contains fields from the PrintRequest model).

printshop.description: The name of the printshop that satisfied the request.

success.description: Indicates whether the operation succeeded (true) or the consumer was not found (false).

200.description: OK

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: the id of the consumer.

200.description: Successful response with a success flag and, when successful, an array of printing schemas.

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: ID of the consumer

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: PrintingSchema to add to the consumer's printing schemas collection

id.description: Auto-generated identifier (usually not provided when creating)

200.description: OK. Returns a JSON object with a boolean 'success' property; when the creation succeeds an 'id' (int64) property with the created PrintingSchema id is returned.

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: The id of the consumer.

parameters.name: printingSchemaID
parameters.description: The id of the printing schema to delete.

200.description: A JSON object indicating the result of the delete operation.

success.description: Present and true when the printing schema was marked deleted successfully.

false.description: Present and true in the failure branch due to a typo in the implementation (the code adds a property named 'false').

parameters.name: consumerID
parameters.description: ID of the consumer

parameters.name: printingSchemaID
parameters.description: ID of the printing schema to edit

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: PrintingSchema object containing updated fields

paperSpecs.description: Paper specifications string (format used by the application)

200.description: Printing schema edited successfully.

500.description: Failed to edit printing schema (internal server error).
